scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ && mkdir -p dist/maplibre && cp -a node_modules/maplibre-gl/dist/. dist/maplibre/ && cp -a node_modules/potpack/. dist/potpack/
scripts.sprites: spreet --unique --minify-index-file style/sprites/svg style/sprites/themapis && spreet --retina --unique --minify-index-file style/sprites/svg style/sprites/themapis@2x
